message.content:
cs.MM, cs.CV, cs.NI, cs.GR, cs.HC

The paper focuses on optimizing the streaming of 360° videos, which involves computer vision (cs.CV) and multimedia (cs.MM) techniques. It also discusses the impact of bandwidth on network infrastructure (cs.NI) and proposes a new quality adaptation logic that maximizes user-perceived quality (cs.HC). Finally, the paper evaluates the proposed system based on user study and trace analysis, which falls under graphics (cs.GR).
